feed.title: Google Cloud: Live Stream API
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Live Stream API

entry.content: You can now distribute live stream content to remote endpoints by using the Secure Reliable Transport (SRT) protocol or the Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP).
entry.summary: You can now distribute live stream content to remote endpoints using SRT or RTMP protocols.
entry.title: Feature: Live stream content distribution

entry.content: You can now create AI-generated captions and translated captions for a live stream.
entry.summary: You can now create AI-generated captions and translated captions for your live stream.
entry.title: Feature: AI-powered captions for live streams

entry.content: Added support for UHD (4K) inputs and outputs.
entry.summary: We've added support for UHD (4K) inputs and outputs.
entry.title: Feature: UHD Support Added

entry.content: Added support for H.265 (HEVC) inputs and outputs, which allows for more efficient compression.
entry.summary: We've added support for H.265 (HEVC) inputs and outputs. This new feature allows for more efficient compression.
entry.title: Feature: HEVC Support Added

entry.content: You can now generate Web Video Text Tracks format (WebVTT) subtitles from cea608 or cea708 embedded captions in the input stream.
entry.summary: Generate WebVTT subtitles from cea608 or cea708 captions in your video streams.
entry.title: Feature: WebVTT subtitles from embedded captions

entry.content: You can now update the encryption key of your encrypted live stream contents while the channel is running.
entry.summary: You can now update the encryption key of your encrypted live stream contents while the channel is running.
entry.title: Feature: Update encryption key of live stream content

entry.content: You can now preview your input streams with ultra-low latency, which allows you to take corrective actions and maintain high-quality viewing experience for your viewers.
entry.summary: Preview your input streams with ultra-low latency to take corrective actions and maintain high-quality viewing experience.
entry.title: Feature: Ultra-low latency stream preview
